audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - University of Michigan Men's Glee Club & Ohio State University Glee Club Join Concert - 1967 November 04
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: University of Michigan. Men's Glee Club
audio_item.dc.rights.access: This material is available for research only in the Reading Room of the Bentley Historical Library at the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 41] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : Tape 1 of 2; The Ohio State University Glee Club performs: Father William; Arise O Ye Servants of God; MÃ¤gdlein in Walde; Stars of the Summer Night. The Impromptus perform selections: Rock A My Soul; Johnny Stiles; When Johnny Comes Marching Home; Campus Echoes. The Michigan Glee Club performs Laudes Atque Carmina; Dona Nobis Pacem; Ave Verum Corpus; The Omnipotence. Bob Mac Grath performs: The Vagabond; Money, O!; Who Shall Speak For the People; The Arbors (selections); Michigan Songs; (The Alma Maters) Carmen Ohio; The Yellow and Blue.
